pageContext.collection_title: B0593, New York State Thruway Authority. Dept. of Public Information and Business Promotion.
pageContext.collection_description: Audio recordings of programs about the Thruway, 1954. The NYS Thruway was a major state accomplishment.
pageContext.collection_notes: While it is not clear that these promotional audio recordings were used on the radio, it seems likely.  Note that the catalog record indicates that there are playback concerns.
